code: import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import translatesUA from"../translates/translatesUA";import translatesRU from"../translates/translatesRU";export default function useText(){var lang=useSelector(function(state){return state.language.lang;});return function(key){if(lang==='ua'){return translatesUA[key]?translatesUA[key]:key;}else if(lang==='ru'){return translatesRU[key]?translatesRU[key]:key;}else{return key;}};}
